Territories 1814 1881 1901 1913 1925 United Kingdom 16,456,303 34,884,848 41,458,721 45,649,000 47,307,000 British India 40,058,408 253,896,330 294,361,056 303,700,000 318,942,000 British Africa 128,977 1,526,110 43,000,000 52,000,000 47,993,000 Other Asian colonies 2,009,005 3,347,770 5,638,944 26,300,000 13,373,000 British North America 486,146 4,522,145 5,600,000 18,000,000 9,047,000 Australasia and Pacific 434,882 2,837,081 5,486,000 7,603,000 European dependencies 180,300 359,403 650,000 656,000 British West Indies 732,171 1,216,409 2,012,655 1,600,000 2,012,000 Total British Empire 61,157,433 305,512,568 400,000,000 447,249,000 449,223,000
